Description: Chiyoda agreed to pay a $28,800 civil penalty and $86,400 to a Supplemental Environmental Project in settlement of allegations it violated its air emissions permits with failures to submit requests for permit modifications and failures to comply with permit record keeping, reports and maintenance conditions.
